statements: SELECT * FROM ExpenseReports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, expense_date, approval_status FROM ExpenseReports WHERE approval_status = 'approved';
SELECT expense_amount, employee_id FROM ExpenseReports WHERE expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT report_id, expense_date FROM ExpenseReports WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ExpenseReports ORDER BY employee_id ASC, expense_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM ExpenseReports WHERE approval_status = 'approved';
SELECT employee_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM ExpenseReports GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM ExpenseReports ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(expense_amount) AS avg_expense FROM ExpenseReports WHERE approval_status = 'pending' GROUP BY employee_id HAVING avg_expense > 500;
SELECT approval_status, COUNT(*) AS num_reports FROM ExpenseReports GROUP BY approval_status ORDER BY num_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM expense_reports;
SELECT report_id, employee_id, expense_amount FROM expense_reports WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT report_id, submission_date FROM expense_reports WHERE expense_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM approvals ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, approver_id, approval_date FROM approvals WHERE approver_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM expense_reports WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY submission_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_id, employee_id FROM expense_reports WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY report_id ASC;

SELECT e.report_id, e.expense_amount, a.approver_id, a.approval_date FROM expense_reports e JOIN approvals a ON e.report_id = a.report_id WHERE e.expense_amount >= 500 AND a.approver_id = 201 ORDER BY e.submission_date ASC, a.approval_date DESC;
SELECT e.report_id, e.employee_id, e.expense_amount, a.approver_id FROM expense_reports e LEFT JOIN approvals a ON e.report_id = a.report_id WHERE a.approver_id IS NULL ORDER BY e.employee_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(expense_amount) AS average_expense FROM expense_reports WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM expense_reports;
SELECT full_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, expense_amount, status FROM expense_reports ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT e.full_name, e.department, a.approval_date FROM employees e JOIN approvals a ON e.employee_id = a.approver_id;
SELECT e.full_name, e.email, er.expense_amount FROM employees e, expense_reports er WHERE e.employee_id = er.employee_id AND e.department = 'Marketing';
SELECT full_name, department, email FROM employees WHERE department = 'Marketing';
SELECT * FROM expense_reports WHERE status = 'Approved' ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT e.full_name, e.department, a.approval_date FROM employees e JOIN approvals a ON e.employee_id = a.approver_id WHERE a.approval_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT er.id, e.full_name, er.expense_amount, a.approval_date FROM expense_reports er JOIN employees e ON er.employee_id = e.employee_id JOIN approvals a ON er.id = a.expense_id;
SELECT e.full_name, SUM(er.expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM employees e JOIN expense_reports er ON e.employee_id = er.employee_id GROUP BY e.full_name HAVING total_expenses > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT report_id, total_amount, submitted_date FROM ExpenseReport WHERE approval_status='Pending';
SELECT employee_name, department, email FROM Employee WHERE department='IT' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT log_id, approver, approval_date FROM ApprovalLog WHERE approval_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ExpenseReport WHERE approval_status ='Approved';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE department ='Finance' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT e.employee_name, ar.total_amount, al.approver FROM Employee e JOIN ExpenseReport ar ON e.employee_id = ar.employee_id JOIN ApprovalLog al ON ar.report_id = al.report_id;
SELECT e.employee_name, SUM(er.total_amount) AS total_expenses FROM Employee e JOIN ExpenseReport er ON e.employee_id = er.employee_id GROUP BY e.employee_name ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT * FROM expense_reports ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT report_name, employee_id, status FROM expense_reports WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT e.employee_name, e.department, a.approval_status FROM employees e INNER JOIN approvals a ON e.employee_id = a.approver_id ORDER BY e.department, e.employee_name;
SELECT ar.report_name, ar.expense_amount, ap.approval_status FROM expense_reports ar LEFT JOIN approvals ap ON ar.id = ap.report_id WHERE ap.approval_status = 'Pending';
SELECT d.department_name, COUNT(e.employee_id) as employee_count FROM departments d LEFT JOIN employees e ON d.department_id = e.employee_id GROUP BY d.department_name ORDER BY employee_count DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM expense_reports WHERE expense_amount > 1000 AND status = 'approved';
SELECT report_name, expense_amount FROM expense_reports WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY employee_name;
SELECT approver_name, department FROM approvers JOIN departments ON approvers.department = departments.department_name WHERE approval_id = 1;
